long_description: Stretchy, immersible and comfortable next to skin, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shorts offer just the right amount of warmth for cool days and cool water without feeling bulky or restrictive. 0.5 mm Terraprene(TM) neoprene with heat-reflecting titanium cuts the chill on cool days. 4-way-stretch exterior allows unrestricted movement, and the soft lining feels great against your skin. Paddler-specific design allows unrestricted freedom of movement and puts seams where they won't cause irritation. A zippered stash pocket in the waistband lets you keep small essentials handy. Waist drawcord cinches with a barrel lock for a secure fit. Durable water repellent exterior coating sheds water to help reduce evaporative cooling. The women's NRS HydroSkin 0.5 Shorts offer a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Stretchy, immersible and comfortable next to skin, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shorts offer just the right amount of warmth for cool days and cool water without feeling bulky or restrictive.
